data.title: Frank miller 300 art
data.meta_description: “Daredevil: Born Again” arrives next year as the final MCU show slated for Phase 5, with a Spring 2024 release on Disney+. Upcoming project : - French production and distribution house...
data.text:
“Daredevil: Born Again” arrives next year as the final MCU show slated for Phase 5, with a Spring 2024 release on Disney+. Upcoming project : - French production and distribution house Studiocanal has partnered with 300 and Sin City author, director and producer Frank Miller to develop the six-part series Corto Maltese, adapted from Italian author Hugo Pratt’s popular comic book. In 2011, Heritage Auctions - the same company that oversaw the Dark Knight Returns sale this month - sold a page of original art from The Dark Knight Returns for almost $450,000. In fact, it bulldozed the previous record of $600,000 pretty thoroughly, and more than quadrupled the highest amount anyone had previously paid for a piece of Miller's art. Publisher: Dynamite Writer: Frank Miller Interior Artist: Frank Miller Cover Artists: Jason Fabok This. The iconic cover to The Dark Knight Returns #1, by artist Frank Miller and colorist Lynn Varley, sold at auction for over $2 million, marking the most money ever paid for a piece of Batman original art. This is a 2023 Megacon Exclusive for Carnivore Comics. Since June 16, 2022, Frank Miller has officially entered the world of the most speculative artists after selling the original cover of his comic book The Dark Knight Returns #1 (1986) for over 2 million dollars at auction in New York.

He is known for his revolutionary work on transforming Batman and Daredevil's characters in stories such as Batman: Year One, the famed The Dark Knight Returns and Daredevil: Born Again.Ĭreator of Elektra, 300, Sin city, Batman The Dark Knight returns. Signed by Legendary creator at NYCC 2022 :įrank Miller is a legendary, yet polarizing comic book creator, writer and artist.
